translation.en: Stop!
Kill Lara Croft
[man on disk] ♪ hey, y'all ♪
Lara's party mix
Oh, bugger!
Not live rounds, Lara.
He's in real pain right now.
This is a major remodel. This is a disaster.
translation.fr:
Je l'avais tout refait.
C'est un désastre !

translation.en: Was it programmed to stop before it took my head off?
translation.fr:
Il était programmé
pour ne pas me couper la tête ?

translation.en: Well, that would be a, no.
But you said make it more challenging, so--
-Hence, the live fire. -Yeah.
Live rounds again.
Poor Simon, what has she done to you?
Very funny. I'm only trying to turn you into a lady.
translation.fr:
- Très drôle.
- J'essaie de faire de vous une lady.

translation.en: -And a lady should be modest. -Yes, a lady should be modest.
translation.fr: Une lady doit être pudique. Une lady "devrait" être pudique.

translation.en: [man] Brothers and sisters,
Today is the 15th of May--
The first day of the planetary alignment--
translation.fr:
le premier jour
de l'alignement des planètes

translation.en: And we are still no nearer to discovering the location of the key.
translation.fr:
et nous ignorons toujours
où se trouve la clé.

translation.en: It seems we are running out of time.
translation.fr: Il semble que le temps nous soit compté.

translation.en: This is not acceptable.
Mr. Powell, your explanation for this is?
translation.fr: M. Powell. Vos explications, s'il vous plaît.

translation.en: I have no explanation. Certainly no excuses.
translation.fr: Je n'ai ni explication ni excuse,

translation.en: Except to once again respectfully remind the council...
translation.fr:
à part celle que je rappelle
humblement au Conseil :

translation.en: That we are working from clues based on ancient cosmological models,
translation.fr:
nos indices sont basés
sur d'anciens modèles cosmologiques

translation.en: Predating Aristotle.
But I'm happy to announce that we're almost ready.
And I am supremely confident...
That we will have our answer in time for the relevant planetary alignment.
translation.fr:
Notre réponse à cet alignement
de planètes sera prête à temps.

translation.en: So, we will have possession of the key in...
translation.fr: Nous aurons donc la clé d'ici...

translation.en: One week.
Yes, indeed. One week.
This is good news, Mr. Powell, but remember:
translation.fr:
Bonne nouvelle, M. Powell.
N'oubliez pas...

translation.en: We have only a single opportunity...
To retrieve the two halves of the triangle.
translation.fr:
d'entrer en possession
des deux moitiés du triangle.

translation.en: And if we fail,
We must wait another 5,000 years.
translation.fr:
nous devrons attendre
à nouveau 5 000 ans.

translation.en: I don't know about you, but that's more time... Than I am prepared to commit to this enterprise.
translation.fr:
Je ne m'engagerai pas aussi longtemps
dans cette entreprise.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -We shall be ready.
Trust me.
We're not, we're not ready, are we? No.
translation.fr:
- On n'est pas prêts, n'est-ce pas ?
- Non.

translation.en: Good morning, Lara. And what a beautiful morning it is.
Back to work, I'm afraid.
It's adventure time.
Egypt again.
It's nothing but pyramids and sand.
translation.fr: Rien que des pyramides et du sable.

translation.en: I know, gets everywhere, in the cracks.
Spanish galleon?
Do you know what day it is, Hillary?
Yes, of course.
The 15th.
And that is never a good day.
translation.fr: Ce n'est jamais une bonne journée.

translation.en: I miss you, daddy.
I wish we could get back the time that was stolen from us.
translation.fr: Tout ce temps qui nous a été volé...

translation.en: [Lara] My father would love to have seen this.
translation.fr:
Mon père aurait tout
donné pour voir ça.

translation.en: Tonight Pluto and Neptune align with Uranus.
translation.fr:
Cette nuit, Pluton et Neptune
s'alignent sur Uranus.

translation.en: It's the first stage of the alignment of all nine planets,
culminating in a full solar eclipse.
translation.fr:
Cela se conclura
par une éclipse totale.

translation.en: It only happens once every 5,000 years.
translation.fr:
Cela n'arrive qu'une fois
tous les 5 000 ans.

translation.en: When is the eclipse?
In one week from today.
But there is plenty to look out for until then.
translation.fr:
Il y a beaucoup de choses
à voir d'ici là.

translation.en: Incredible.
[Man] I wish you could remember her.
translation.fr:
Tu ne te souviens pas d'elle.
Elle t'aimait tant.

translation.en: -She loved you so much. -Mummy!
translation.fr:
Tu ne te souviens pas d'elle.
Elle t'aimait tant. Maman !

translation.en: I wish I could remember her too.
I still have you, daddy.
translation.fr: mais tu es avec moi, papa.

translation.en: Yes, you do.
The exact alignment of the planets necessary to activate the triangle...
translation.fr:
Cet alignement de planètes, nécessaire à l'activation
du triangle,

translation.en: Only occurs once every 5,000 years.
translation.fr: ne se produit que tous les 5 000 ans.

translation.en: But that will prove to be just long enough...
translation.fr: Cela laisse juste assez de temps

translation.en: For little Lara Croft to grow up...
translation.fr: à la petite Lara pour grandir

translation.en: [echoes] and to find it.
[Lara] Bryce!
[Knock on door] Hello, fellas.
-How's business? -Bryce!
[knocking] okay, okay. I'm coming. I'm coming.
We have 83 rooms. Why can't you live in the house?
translation.fr:
On a 83 pièces
et tu vis pas avec nous ?

translation.en: Well, I'm a free spirit, me.
Right.
[sniffing] What's that smell?
translation.fr:
- Quelle est cette odeur ?
- 5 h du matin.

translation.en: 5:00 a.m. Let's go.
translation.fr:
- Quelle est cette odeur ?
- 5 h du matin. Allons-y.

translation.en: This had better be good.
[yawns] It's a clock.
I found it last night. It was ticking.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai trouvée cette nuit.
Elle faisait tic-tac.

translation.en: Must be one of them ticking clocks?
translation.fr:
Encore une horloge
qui fait tic-tac...

translation.en: It was hidden in a secret room.
translation.fr: Elle était dans une pièce secrète.

translation.en: Bryce, don't start.
Well, Lara, it's a clock. It ticks. It tells the time. It's wrong.
translation.fr:
C'est une pendule ! Elle fait tic-tac et donne l'heure.
Elle retarde.

translation.en: It started ticking last night during the first stage of the alignment.
translation.fr:
Elle s'est mise en route cette nuit,
avec l'alignement des planètes.

translation.en: [sighs] Well, gonna need some coffee.
[whirs] Okay, in we go.
Looks pretty ordinary to me.
Well, keep looking.
Your coffee, sir. Decaf latte with nonfat milk.
translation.fr: Votre décaféiné, avec du lait écrémé.

translation.en: Oh, champion. Steaming sump oil.
Wait. What did you do?
-I don't know. What did I do? -Where is that?
translation.fr:
Je n'en sais rien. - Où est-ce ?
- Je n'en sais rien.

translation.en: I don't know. I just took my hand off the fiber optics.
translation.fr:
- Où est-ce ?
- Je n'en sais rien. J'ai ôté ma main de la fibre optique.
C'est quoi ?

translation.en: -[Hillary] what is that? -[Bryce] Oh, bugger!
translation.fr:
J'ai ôté ma main de la fibre optique.
C'est quoi ? Bon Dieu !

translation.en: Screw 13 to quadrant four.
Screw 14 to quadrant three.
Oh, please.
It's my map so I know where they all came from.
translation.fr:
C'est pour me rappeler
où elles se vissent.

translation.en: It's camouflage.
Okay.
Hidden within.
[scoffs] What is that?
The all seeing eye.
Lot 121, a Louis XV ormolu mounted bracket clock.
translation.fr: Lot 121 : pendule Louis XV, dorée à l'or fin.

translation.en: Showing on my left, 1,800,000 pounds.
1,800,000. Thank you. One million eight. 1,900,000.
translation.fr:
Un million huit cents milles,
merci. 1 900 000 £.

translation.en: Two million pounds. Two million pounds now.
Any advance on 2,100,000 pounds?
Any more? Two million one. 2,200,000. Thank you, sir.
2,200,000 pounds now.
translation.fr: Deux millions deux cent mille livres. 2 200 000... 2 300 000.

translation.en: Two million three. 2,400,000.
Against you, sir. Two million five? No.
2,400,000 pounds, then. Lady's bid at two million four. 2,500,000 pounds.
In a new place at 2,500,000 pounds. [relieved sigh]
Any more at 2,500,000 pounds? Sold.
[auctioneer continues] Lara, my dear.
-Mr. Wilson. -Let's go into my study. Let me take that for you.
translation.fr:
Allons dans mon bureau.
Je te débarrasse.

translation.en: Lara Croft. I don't believe it.
translation.fr:
Lara Croft.
Je n'arrive pas à y croire.

translation.en: -I'll just be a minute. -Hi.
You still pretending to be a photo journalist?
You know, I think it's really cool that you still have a day job,
translation.fr:
Je trouve
ça génial d'avoir un métier,

translation.en: Even though it's obviously just for show.
translation.fr: même si c'est pour la galerie.

translation.en: So, Alex, are you still pretending to be an archaeologist?
translation.fr:
Et vous, Alex, vous prétendez
toujours être archéologue ?

translation.en: Lara, do we always have to fight like this? I mean, maybe we don't.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi toujours s'affronter ?
Est-ce bien utile ?

translation.en: -Maybe we do. -Why?
-You stole my prayer wheels. -Stole? Stole?
translation.fr: Et le vol de mes moulins à prières ? Le vol ?

translation.en: From you? You know, that's funny. You know, it's-- It's not like you ever really owned them or anything.
translation.fr:
Venant de vous, c'est cocasse.
Comme s'ils étaient à vous !

translation.en: Hey, you're the tomb raider.
translation.fr: C'est vous le pilleur de tombes.

translation.en: [Man] Mr. West, we are ready for you.
Oh, I think your clients need you.
translation.fr: Vos clients ont besoin de vous.

translation.en: Go ahead. You're wanted on the floor.
After all, as you once said so memorably, "it's all just a business."
translation.fr:
C'est bien vous qui disiez :
"Ce n'est qu'un business."

translation.en: Right? So, go do business.
Go.
Lara. Lara, you--
Lara, this is a unique object.
Only one of the dials is working.
translation.fr:
Seul un des cadrans fonctionne.
Il luit.

translation.en: It glows like the eye, lesser. But it seems to be getting brighter.
translation.fr:
Comme le petit œil.
Il brille de plus en plus.

translation.en: And it's also running backwards--
Like it's not so much keeping time, but counting down to something.
translation.fr:
Comme si le temps était compté :
un compte à rebours.

translation.en: -Yes. -And look at the back.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Tournez-le. Ça a l'air de s'emboîter

translation.en: It's as though it fits into something, almost like a key.
translation.fr:
- Oui.
- Tournez-le. Ça a l'air de s'emboîter dans quelque chose.
On dirait une clé.

translation.en: Yes. Yes, fascinating.
Incredibly beautiful.
My father once told me of a magical triangle stamped with the all seeing eye.
translation.fr:
Mon père me parlait du triangle
avec l'Œil qui Voit Tout.

translation.en: He said it gave its possessor extraordinary power--
translation.fr:
Son propriétaire en tirait
des pouvoirs extraordinaires,

translation.en: The power to control time.
translation.fr: le pouvoir de maîtriser le temps.

translation.en: He called it the triangle of light. Have you heard of it?
translation.fr:
Il l'appelait le Triangle de Lumière.
Vous connaissez ?

translation.en: No. No, I haven't.
He always steered his own course, your father.
translation.fr: Ton père suivait sa propre route.

translation.en: He was a great man.
Would you like some port?
-It's really very fine. -No.
I can't help you, Lara.
This clock truly is a mystery.
translation.fr: Cette horloge est un vrai mystère.

translation.en: -[Lara] Hello. -Lara?
Hello, it's Mr. Wilson.
Yes. Well, I-- you see, I had a second thought...
translation.fr:
C'est M. Wilson. Eh, bien...
J'ai repensé à ton horloge.

translation.en: About that clock.
translation.fr:
Eh, bien...
J'ai repensé à ton horloge.

translation.en: There is a man who may be able to help you.
I gave him your number. His name is Manfred Powell. You should see him.
translation.fr:
Je lui ai donné ton téléphone.
Il s'appelle Manfred Powell. Tu devrais le rencontrer.

translation.en: Oh, thank you. I will.
-Good-bye, Lara. -You take care.
translation.fr:
- Au revoir.
- Prenez soin de vous.

translation.en: Thank you. [explosion]
Bugger.
Forgive me.
Lady Croft.
-Mr. Powell. -Oh, no, no, no. Good heavens, no.
I'm actually his associate, Mr. Pimms.
translation.fr: Je suis son associé, M. Pimms.

translation.en: -Mr. Pimms? -Yeah, like the beverage.
Yeah, she's here.
What does Mr. Powell do?
He's a lawyer. I'm his law clerk...
translation.fr: Il est avocat. Je suis son assistant,

translation.en: And fairly recent appointment, but enjoying it, all the varied work.
translation.fr:
depuis peu de temps,
mais j'aime ça. Le travail est varié.

translation.en: -A lawyer. -Isn't it obvious?
translation.fr: Il est avocat ? N'est-ce pas évident ?

translation.en: Lady Croft, my pleasure. Manfred powell, Q.C.
translation.fr:
Lady Croft... enchanté. Manfred Powell,
conseiller de la reine.

translation.en: -Good morning. -I believe you are quite an authority...
translation.fr:
Enchantée. Vous faites autorité en matière
d'antiquités et de mythologie.

translation.en: -On things ancient and mythological. -Well, I travel.
translation.fr:
Vous faites autorité en matière
d'antiquités et de mythologie. Je voyage.

translation.en: No, no, Mr. Wilson said you were quite the archaeologist.
translation.fr:
D'après M. Wilson,
vous êtes une véritable archéologue.

translation.en: Please.
Oh, he's very sweet.
He knew your father, I believe.
Yes, they were great friends.
I had the honor of meeting him myself once, in Venice.
translation.fr:
J'ai eu l'honneur de le rencontrer,
à Venise.

translation.en: I was so sorry to hear about his death.
translation.fr: J'ai été désolé d'apprendre sa mort.

translation.en: This is the clock I spoke of.
translation.fr:
Voici l'horloge
dont je vous ai parlé.

translation.en: Very interesting.
It's a shame you only brought photographs.
Nevertheless, it is fascinating.
You said it started ticking the night of the alignment.
translation.fr:
Elle fonctionne
depuis la nuit de l'alignement ?

translation.en: Yes.
You said you were a lawyer?
-Yes. -And the study of clocks is a hobby?
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes avocat ?
- Oui. L'horlogerie est un passe-temps ?

translation.en: This is an obsession.
Really my specialty. My practice centers around antiquities.
translation.fr:
J'exerce dans le domaine
des antiquités,

translation.en: But the origin of this clock...
Completely eludes me.
I think I've never seen anything quite so beautiful that I know so little about.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais rien vu d'aussi beau
dont je sais si peu.

translation.en: This is a pleasurable torment.
My ignorance amuses me.
"My ignorance amuses me."
[Scoffs] "My ignorance amuses me"?
Yes, well, I've always found your ignorance quite amusing.
Powell, however, is not ignorant.
-No? -No.
He's a liar.
-Anything you need? -No. Thank you, Hillary.
translation.fr:
- Vous désirez quelque chose ?
- Non, merci.

translation.en: -Don't you stay up too late. -I won't.
translation.fr: Ne vous couchez pas trop tard.

translation.en: Forward team, wait for my command.
[man 2] In position awaiting your order.
translation.fr: En position. On attend vos ordres.

translation.en: Bastards! [gunshots]
Bloody hell!
On the left. On the left.
-[beeping] -Come on, Simon, come on!
Come on. Come on!
[Bryce] Lara, Lara, are you there? Pick up!
Lara, can you hear me? Are you okay?
Bryce, I'm in the equipment room.
translation.fr:
Bryce, je suis au sous-sol.
Ils volent mon horloge !

translation.en: -They're stealing my bloody clock. -I know. I saw them.
translation.fr:
Bryce, je suis au sous-sol.
Ils volent mon horloge ! Je les ai vus !

translation.en: Bryce, you have to be my eyes.
-Are you armed? -After a fashion, yes.
translation.fr: Tu es armée ? Tant bien que mal.

translation.en: All right, three bad guys. Number one standing by the Aston Martin.
translation.fr:
Très bien, trois méchants. Trois bandits.
Numéro 1, près de l'Aston Martin.

translation.en: Right.
-Bingo! -[gunfire]
-Next. -Okay, number two, crouched by the McLaren.
translation.fr: Suivant. Numéro 2, près de la McLaren.

translation.en: Oh, bugger!
-Are you okay? -I just found my car keys.
translation.fr: Ça va ? J'ai trouvé mes clés.

translation.en: You're done, mate. Nice one.
I think they've all gone.
Well, they got what they came for.
translation.fr:
Ils ont ce qu'ils
étaient venus chercher.

translation.en: Sorry about that.
[gulps] That's fine.
Hello? [rap, indistinct]
What the hell happened here?
-Morning. -Lady Lara Croft?
Yes. You have something for me?
I woke up this morning, and I just hated everything.
translation.fr:
En me réveillant,
j'ai détesté absolument tout.

translation.en: Right. Thanks.
Who's Stribling, Clive and Winterset then? Sounds like a bunch of lawyers.
translation.fr:
Qui sont Stribling, Clive
et Winterset ? On dirait des avocats.

translation.en: They are a bunch of lawyers.
-Well, I'll shut my face again. -You are nosy.
translation.fr:
Je la ferme. - Vous êtes curieux.
- Non, j'ai juste vu les noms.

translation.en: I'm not nosy. I just saw the name and asked her what the name was.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes curieux.
- Non, j'ai juste vu les noms. Drôles de noms.
C'était juste une question.

translation.en: Lara?
It's from my father.
It was written before he died...
translation.fr: Elle est datée d'avant sa mort.

translation.en: And delivered today as per his instructions.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai qu'aujourd'hui,
comme il l'a souhaité.

translation.en: Blimey!
[Lara reading] "To see a world in a grain of sand...
translation.fr:
"Voir le monde dans
un grain de sable,

translation.en: And a heaven in a wild flower,
Hold infinity in the palm of your hand,
translation.fr:
"Tenir l'infini dans
le creux de sa main,

translation.en: And eternity in an hour.
William Blake."
The all seeing eye.
[Lord Croft's voice] My darling daughter,
I knew you'd figure this out.
If you are reading this letter, I am no longer with you,
translation.fr:
Si tu lis cette lettre,
c'est que j'ai disparu.

translation.en: And I miss you... And love you always and forever.
translation.fr:
Tu me manques.
Je t'aime toujours et à jamais.

translation.en: It also means I have failed...
translation.fr: Cela veut aussi dire que j'ai échoué

translation.en: And must place an awful burden on your shoulders.
translation.fr:
et que je t'ai laissé
un terrible fardeau à porter.

translation.en: Lara, by now I am sure you will have discovered the clock I concealed.
translation.fr:
Lara, tu as dû découvrir l'horloge
que j'avais cachée.

translation.en: The clock is the key, Lara.
It will unlock the hiding place of two pieces of a sacred icon.
translation.fr:
Elle révélera où sont cachées
les deux parties d'une icône sacrée :

translation.en: This is the magical triangle I told you about when you were a little girl.
translation.fr:
le triangle magique dont
je te parlais quand tu étais petite.

translation.en: The triangle of light. But it is no bedtime story.
translation.fr: Le Triangle de Lumière. Ce n'est pas un conte pour enfants.

translation.en: The triangle was forged from metal found in the crater of a meteor...
translation.fr:
Il est fait d'un métal
trouvé dans un cratère de météorite.

translation.en: That had fallen to earth at the exact moment...
Of the previous alignment of the nine planets.
translation.fr:
lors du précédent alignement
des 9 planètes.

translation.en: The people of the light built a great city in this crater...
translation.fr:
Le Peuple de la Lumière
édifia une cité,

translation.en: Where they worshipped the triangle for its ability to control time.
translation.fr:
et voua un culte au triangle
qui a pouvoir sur le temps.

translation.en: It gave its possessor a power that could be used for good or great evil.
translation.fr:
Un pouvoir pouvant être
utilisé en bien ou en mal.

translation.en: The abuse of this power led to the destruction of the city.
translation.fr:
Son usage abusif conduisit
à la destruction de leur cité.

translation.en: To be sure no man would ever again wield this power,
translation.fr:
Afin que plus personne
ne puisse utiliser ce pouvoir,

translation.en: They split the triangle into two pieces...
translation.fr: ils le brisèrent en deux morceaux

translation.en: And hid them at opposite ends of the earth.
translation.fr:
qu'ils cachèrent
aux extrémités de la Terre.

translation.en: Lara, do you remember the jasmine that only grows...
translation.fr:
Tu te souviens du jasmin qui ne pousse que dans un temple,
sur une ancienne piste khmère ?

translation.en: In one temple along the ancient khmer trail in Cambodia?
translation.fr:
qui ne pousse que dans un temple,
sur une ancienne piste khmère ?

translation.en: Find that and you will have found the entrance to the tomb of the dancing light,
translation.fr:
Il indique l'entrée
de la Tombe de la Lumière qui Danse

translation.en: Where the first half of the triangle is hidden.
translation.fr: où se trouve une moitié du triangle.

translation.en: You must be there at the exact moment...
translation.fr: Tu dois y être au moment exact

translation.en: of the second phase of the planetary alignment.
translation.fr:
où aura lieu la seconde phase
de l'alignement.

translation.en: You must hurry. You have very little time.
translation.fr: Dépêche-toi. Tu as peu de temps.

translation.en: And as the planets move into alignment, The world will be in great danger,
translation.fr:
Quand les planètes seront alignées,
le monde sera en grand danger.

translation.en: for the secret society known as the Illuminati--
Devious dangerous men, who seek to fulfill an ancient prophecy...
translation.fr:
composée d'hommes dangereux, cherche à accomplir une ancienne
prophétie, en réunissant le triangle

translation.en: by reuniting the two halves...
translation.fr:
cherche à accomplir une ancienne
prophétie, en réunissant le triangle

translation.en: And attaining the triangle's awesome and terrible powers.
translation.fr:
afin de s'octroyer ses terribles
et effrayants pouvoirs.

translation.en: This you must prevent at all costs.
translation.fr:
Tu dois les en empêcher
à n'importe quel prix.

translation.en: So, Lara, I am asking you to complete my work--
translation.fr:
Lara, je te demande d'achever
mon travail.

translation.en: To find and destroy both halves of the triangle.
translation.fr:
Trouve et détruis
les deux moitiés du triangle.

translation.en: How are you going to get to Cambodia and get the clock back in 15 hours?
translation.fr:
Comment peux-tu aller au Cambodge
et ramener l'horloge en 15 heures ?

translation.en: I'll be calling in a favor.
What kind of favor?
Well, that is a secret.
translation.fr:
C'est un secret.
Si je vous le disais,

translation.en: If I told you, I'd have to kill you.
translation.fr:
C'est un secret.
Si je vous le disais, il faudrait que je vous tue.

translation.en: [Man on radio] Lady Croft, are you on target? Over.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes sur la cible ? À vous. Pile dessus. Merci, les gars.
Terminé.

translation.en: Right on target. Thank you, boys. Over and out.
translation.fr:
Pile dessus. Merci, les gars.
Terminé.

translation.en: [Lara] Mr. Powell.
How predictable.
Alex West.
What are you doing here?
We have 72 minutes to the next alignment.
translation.fr:
Il reste 72 mn
avant le prochain alignement.

translation.en: We have to work faster.
-Come on, guys! -[workers chanting]
[Alex] Come on, guys! Come on, pull!
Pull! It's coming!
Good.
So, any sign of Lady Croft?
translation.fr:
Alors... - Aucun signe de Lady Croft ?
- Pas encore.

translation.en: Not yet.
translation.fr:
- Aucun signe de Lady Croft ?
- Pas encore.

translation.en: Lara's overrated. She's good, don't get me wrong,
translation.fr:
Vous la surestimez.
D'accord, elle est forte,

translation.en: But she's in it for the glory,
translation.fr: mais elle se bat pour la gloire

translation.en: -whereas I'm in it for the money. -Fortunately.
translation.fr: alors que moi, c'est pour l'argent. Heureusement.

translation.en: -Into the belly of the beast. -And out of the demon's ass.
translation.fr: On entre dans le ventre de la bête. On sortira par le cul du démon.

translation.en: Jasmine.
Wow.
Remember, what we are looking for is hidden not only in space... But also in time.
translation.fr:
Il faut chercher à la fois
dans l'espace et dans le temps.

translation.en: The clock is the key.
My god.
"Return the iron to the stone's embrace,
translation.fr:
"Replace l'œil
dans son orbite de pierre,

translation.en: the wheel of heaven will turn.
Exhume the light from its watery grave,
to receive the gift of heaven...
translation.fr: "et tu recevras un cadeau du ciel

translation.en: As you are condemned to the depths of hell."
Right. So, pretty much touch anything and you get your head chopped off.
translation.fr:
Touchez à quelque chose
et des têtes tomberont.

translation.en: [Powell] We have two minutes, Mr. West.
translation.fr: Il nous reste deux minutes, M. West.

translation.en: You're the tomb raider. Figure it out.
translation.fr:
C'est vous le pilleur de tombes.
Trouvez !

translation.en: Mr. West,
Tempus fugit.
Yes, "time flies."
[Alex] It's the swords!
Come on, guys, get up here. Give me a hand here.
That's it. Come on. Coming down.
I want them all down. Take them, carry them across the ladders.
-Come on, guys, let's hustle. -[men chattering]
[Alex] All right, now slide them into the slots over there.
[Powell] We place the clock here at the exact moment of alignment.
translation.fr:
On placera l'horloge
au moment exact de l'alignement.

translation.en: [Alex] Come on, let's go! Move it!
Too slow, ladies, too slow. Come on.
-[Alex] That's it. -Count it down.
-The timing needs to be exact. -No shit.
translation.fr:
- Le minutage doit être parfait.
- Sans blague.

translation.en: [Alex] Sixty seconds to go.
Fifty seconds.
[Lara] Mr. Powell!
Cease fire! Hold your fire!
-Keep counting. -You're making a big mistake!
-Hey, Lara. -Tourist visa?
-No, I'm working. -Lady Croft, tell me,
translation.fr:
- Visa touriste ?
- Je travaille. Lady Croft,
dois-je vous laisser en vie ?

translation.en: is there a good reason why I kept you alive?
translation.fr:
Lady Croft,
dois-je vous laisser en vie ? Oui, ce n'est pas le bon œil.

translation.en: [Alex continues counting] Yes. That is not the true eye.
translation.fr: Oui, ce n'est pas le bon œil.

translation.en: This is the true eye.
It's not, actually. It's a mirror image.
translation.fr:
- C'est le bon !
- Non. C'est son reflet.

translation.en: Miss Croft, I think you're trying to cheat me out of my little ray of sunshine.
translation.fr:
Vous essayez de me prendre
mon petit rayon de soleil.

translation.en: Why would I try and cheat you out of anything now?
translation.fr: Pas maintenant. J'ai besoin de vous.

translation.en: I need you to get the piece so I can steal it from you later.
translation.fr: Trouvez le morceau et je le volerai.

translation.en: You're bluffing.
Julius, make a mental note: kill miss Croft if she attempts any such thing.
translation.fr:
Julius, prenez note :
tuez Mlle Croft si elle essaie.

translation.en: Yes, sir, Mr. Powell.
We can do it my way, or we can all come back in time for the next alignment,
translation.fr:
On fait à ma manière ou on revient
pour le prochain alignement

translation.en: and you are welcome to try and kill me then.
translation.fr: et vous essaierez de me tuer dans...

translation.en: In, say another 5,000 years.
Ten... Nine... Eight...
Seven... Six... Five...
Four... Three...
Two... One...
Zero.
Well, I guess she was right.
The log must pierce the urn.
Come on!
[Alex] It's slowing down. It's never gonna make it.
translation.fr: Il ralentit. Il ne va pas y arriver.

translation.en: Pure light, fire and water.
Croft!
-Get the clock. -Got it.
-[Alex] Hold it right there! -[gun cocks]
Lara, give it up.
Are you going to shoot me, Alex?
My phone is wet.
[Cell phone ringing] Yes? Lady Croft. How are you?
translation.fr: Oui ? Lady Croft ! Comment ça va ?

translation.en: -Alive. -And kicking, I hope.
translation.fr: Je suis vivante. Et en bon état, je suppose ?

translation.en: -And you? -Superlative.
Of course, I digress. You have my half of the triangle.
translation.fr:
Petite digression :
vous avez ma moitié de triangle.

translation.en: And you have my father's clock.
translation.fr:
Vous avez l'horloge de mon père. Ma chère,
nous avons besoin l'un de l'autre.

translation.en: Listen, my dear. Without each other we are quite useless at this point.
translation.fr:
Ma chère,
nous avons besoin l'un de l'autre.

translation.en: We should reevaluate our positions.
translation.fr:
Révisons nos positions.
Que ça vous plaise ou pas,

translation.en: Like it or not, you and I are in business together.
translation.fr:
Révisons nos positions.
Que ça vous plaise ou pas, on est en affaires.
Organisons une réunion.

translation.en: We should have a business meeting.
translation.fr:
on est en affaires.
Organisons une réunion. Vous auriez une nouvelle occasion
pour tenter de me tuer.

translation.en: You mean you'd love to have another opportunity to try and kill me.
translation.fr:
Vous auriez une nouvelle occasion
pour tenter de me tuer.

translation.en: Oh, that's harsh.
But perhaps. Wait and see.
Come to Venice, via Dolorosa.
translation.fr: Venez à Venise. Via de la Rosa.

translation.en: Wonderful. Bye then.
Harder.
[Voice on tv] Here it comes. Hide, everybody.
translation.fr: Le voilà. Cachez-vous, tout le monde.

translation.en: Look out. It's some sort of machine. [Phone rings]
translation.fr: Regardez. C’est une sorte de machine.

translation.en: -[Lara] Bryce? Bryce, it's me. -Hello?
[Tv mutes] Bryce, it's Lara.
-I found the temple. Ran into Mr. Powell. -[sighs]
translation.fr:
J'ai trouvé le temple.
Je suis tombée sur M. Powell.

translation.en: -Did you get the clock. -No, but I got the first piece.
translation.fr: Tu as l'horloge ? Non, mais j'ai la moitié du triangle.

translation.en: Oh, beautiful, smashing.
-Seems I'm level pegging with Mr. Powell. -Well,
translation.fr: Je suis à égalité avec Powell.

translation.en: -won't he just want to kill you now? -No, silly.
translation.fr:
- Il cherche pas à te tuer ?
- Non, idiot.

translation.en: His problem is that he needs the piece that I have.
translation.fr: Il a besoin de cette moitié.

translation.en: -Until then, I'm his new best friend. -What about the other half?
translation.fr:
Pour l'instant,
je suis sa meilleure amie. Et l'autre moitié ?
L'alignement a lieu

translation.en: The final alignment is in 66 hours and 53 minutes,
translation.fr:
Et l'autre moitié ?
L'alignement a lieu dans 66 heures 53 minutes
et on ignore toujours

translation.en: And we've still got no idea where the second piece is hidden.
He's going to tell me where the second piece is.
-He will? -Bryce, trust me. Pack for venice.
translation.fr:
- Tu crois ?
- Fais-moi confiance. Viens à Venise.

translation.en: Pack for where? Hello? Lara?
[scoffs] Bye then.
Drink.
Rest.
There's no rest for the wicked.
translation.fr: Pas de repos pour les braves.

translation.en: You got what you came for?
translation.fr:
- Tu as trouvé ce que tu cherchais ?
- Oui.

translation.en: -I did, yes. -Too bad.
translation.fr:
- Tu as trouvé ce que tu cherchais ?
- Oui. Dommage pour l'humanité.

translation.en: -Bad for the world. -The world is safe now.
translation.fr: Dommage pour l'humanité. L'humanité est en sécurité.

translation.en: Little bit safer, perhaps,
translation.fr: Un peu plus en sécurité, peut-être.

translation.en: Because you will go on.
translation.fr:
Tu vas continuer.
Ton père le disait :

translation.en: Your father said you will never give up.
My father? You knew my father?
Now, drink. Finish your tea.
-It tastes quite bad, -[laughs]
but it is good for you, see?
translation.fr: Mais il te fera du bien. Tu vois.

translation.en: Good evening.
You're with the Illuminati.
Beg your pardon? There's no such thing. It's just a bedtime story.
translation.fr:
Pardon ? Ils n'existent pas.
C'est un conte pour enfants.

translation.en: Illuminati.
The people of the light.
Have you brought my triangle?
translation.fr: Vous avez la moitié du triangle ?

translation.en: No, of course you haven't. You've hidden it somewhere.
translation.fr: Non, bien sûr. Vous l'avez cachée.

translation.en: Well, you can keep the triangle you have,
translation.fr: Vous avez la moitié du triangle,

translation.en: and I will keep your father's clock, and we can be partners.
translation.fr:
j'ai l'horloge de votre père.
Faisons équipe.

translation.en: Who sits here?
We can be partners and go for the big prize--
translation.fr:
Ensemble, pour remporter
le gros lot :

translation.en: The triangle of light.
Yes, but who sits here?
It's an incredible dream, an awesome power.
translation.fr:
C'est un rêve incroyable, un pouvoir impressionnant
capable de réparer les injustices.

translation.en: It could set right so many wrongs.
translation.fr:
un pouvoir impressionnant
capable de réparer les injustices.

translation.en: I don't think you sit here, do you?
I sit here,
on God's right hand, as it were.
translation.fr: À la droite de Dieu, pour ainsi dire.

translation.en: In fact, I now sit... exactly where your father sat.
translation.fr:
En fait, je siège à la place
qu'occupait votre père.

translation.en: You're lying.
No. No, he mentored me in the order.
translation.fr:
Non. Il a été mon mentor
au sein de l'Ordre.

translation.en: It was truly an honor.
I don't believe you.
My father was not with the Illuminati. He would have told me.
translation.fr:
Il n'était pas un Illuminati.
Il me l'aurait dit.

translation.en: He had a great many secrets.
Not from me.
Especially from you.
-I know what you want, Lara. -Oh, I doubt it.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que vous voulez. J'en doute.

translation.en: Another life with your father,
translation.fr: Une autre vie avec votre père.

translation.en: a second chance.
It'll be within my power to give.
The triangle gives its possessor...
translation.fr: Le triangle donne à son propriétaire

translation.en: The power of God--
To move back and forth through time, undo the past.
translation.fr:
aller et venir dans le temps,
modifier le passé.

translation.en: Help me, and you will get what I know you want--
translation.fr:
Aidez-moi
et vous réaliserez votre souhait.

translation.en: To have your father returned to you.
And how do I know once I gave you that piece...
translation.fr:
Qui me dit qu'une fois
en possession du triangle,

translation.en: that you wouldn't then just try to kill me?
translation.fr: vous n'essaierez pas de me tuer ?

translation.en: Would it make it easier for you--
translation.fr: Ce serait plus facile pour vous ?

translation.en: On more familiar ground-- if I killed you now?
translation.fr:
Vous comprendriez mieux
si j'essayais maintenant ?

translation.en: Will you reconsider?
Hello, Alex.
I suppose you think I'm a greedy, unscrupulous sellout...
translation.fr:
Pour vous,
je suis un traître gourmand,

translation.en: And do just about anything for money. Yes, that's right.
translation.fr:
- prêt à tout pour de l'argent.
- Exact.

translation.en: Well, the money bit's true, I guess.
Is it, Alex?
If you cross me, we may not be able to remain friends.
translation.fr:
Trahissez-moi
et on pourrait ne plus être amis.

translation.en: -Always a pleasure. -[sighs]
Now for a cold shower.
-[Pimms] I think we're in big trouble. -Hold this, will you?
translation.fr:
- On va avoir des problèmes.
- Tiens ça.

translation.en: Thank you. They already think we have Lady Croft's piece of the triangle.
translation.fr:
Ils croient
qu'on a la moitié du triangle ?

translation.en: Yes. They think it's in that box you're carrying right now.
translation.fr:
Ils croient
qu'elle est dans cette boîte.

translation.en: -Is it? -Why don't you worry about something else?
translation.fr:
- Et c'est le cas ?
- Pourquoi tu t'inquiètes ?

translation.en: Of course it's not.
I don't understand. What chance of success do we have without the piece?
translation.fr:
Je ne comprends pas. Sans ce
morceau, quelles sont nos chances ?

translation.en: Zero. Don't dwell on it.
Lady Croft.
What a nice surprise.
Thank you.
Now, time to save the universe again then, is it?
Absolutely.
Are we sure she's really necessary?
Well, one tomb raider is good. Two, better.
translation.fr:
Deux pilleurs de tombes
valent mieux qu'un.

translation.en: Me bum's gone to sleep again, all down the left cheek.
translation.fr: Je ne sens plus ma fesse gauche.

translation.en: Really? That's fascinating.
-How much longer? -A few hours.
We have to take the last hour over land. Helicopters won't fly near the ruined city.
translation.fr:
La dernière heure se fera au sol. Les hélicos ne peuvent
s'approcher de la cité détruite.

translation.en: It's a dead zone.
We take all doggies, da
Much-o U.S. Greenback, da. All doggies.
Welcome to the dead zone.
[grunts] It's not a country. It's an ice cube!
translation.fr: C'est pas un pays, c'est un glaçon.

translation.en: Come on!
All right. Let's go.
Go on, get it!
Holy shit.
It's a time storm. Time is broken here.
translation.fr: C'est une distorsion du temps. Une faille temporelle.

translation.en: We must find the eye! All of you! Hurry!
We're running out of time! Hurry! Hurry!
It's begun.
Fifty bucks says the piece is inside the sun.
translation.fr:
50 $ que le morceau
est dans le soleil.

translation.en: For God's sake, hurry! The eclipse will be over in a few minutes!
translation.fr:
Dépêchez-vous ! L'éclipse prend fin
dans quelques minutes.

translation.en: Alex, give me the clock. I know what to do.
-[grunting] -Has she got the piece?
We will now unite these two parts--
The past and the present.
At last, we of the Illuminati...
translation.fr:
Enfin, nous, les Illuminati,
allons contrôler le temps

translation.en: Will control time and fulfill the sacred promise to our ancestors.
translation.fr:
Enfin, nous, les Illuminati,
allons contrôler le temps et respecter la promesse
faite à nos ancêtres.

translation.en: -Soon, the entire world will bow-- -Enough of this twaddle.
translation.fr: Bientôt, le monde entier... Assez de charabia.

translation.en: Come on! Come on!
Not quite what you hoped for, Mr. Powell?
translation.fr: C'est pas ce que vous espériez ?

translation.en: Oh, Lara,
I have a gut instinct about this.
translation.fr: Je me fie à mon instinct.

translation.en: After all, you are the daughter of a genius.
translation.fr:
Après tout,
vous êtes la fille d'un génie.

translation.en: Let me test my theory.
You had to let him go. No more bubbles.
You show me how to complete the triangle, we can change his fate.
translation.fr:
Montrez-moi
comment réunir le triangle, nous changerons son destin.

translation.en: If you deliver me the power of god, I will spare him.
translation.fr:
Donnez-moi le pouvoir de Dieu et je l'épargnerai.
D'un petit retour en arrière.

translation.en: It's only a little trip back in time.
translation.fr:
et je l'épargnerai.
D'un petit retour en arrière. Vous avez déjà
la réponse au problème.

translation.en: But I'm pretty sure you've figured out the answer to the problem.
translation.fr:
Vous avez déjà
la réponse au problème.

translation.en: And then, of course, there's the loss of your father.
translation.fr:
De plus,
vous avez aussi perdu votre père.

translation.en: I can change that.
You'd better be ready for this.
-Unhook your laser sight. -Do it.
"To see a world in a grain of sand."
translation.fr:
"Voir le monde dans
un grain de sable."

translation.en: Daddy?
Lara.
Is this real?
It is a crossing...
Of my past and your present.
translation.fr: de mon passé et de ton présent.

translation.en: Why did you not tell me about the Illuminati?
translation.fr:
Tu ne m'as jamais
parlé des Illuminati.

translation.en: -You were only a child. -You could have written in your journals.
translation.fr:
Tu n'étais qu'une enfant. Même dans ton journal,
pas une fois tu n'en parles.

translation.en: You never mentioned it-- not once.
translation.fr:
Même dans ton journal,
pas une fois tu n'en parles.

translation.en: I burst to tell you everything.
translation.fr:
Je brûlais d'envie
de tout te raconter.

translation.en: But in the fierceness of my own battles,
translation.fr:
Mon combat était trop violent. Je me suis efforcé de te préserver
et d'assurer ta sécurité.

translation.en: I strove to tell you only that which would inspire you and keep you safe.
translation.fr:
Je me suis efforcé de te préserver
et d'assurer ta sécurité.

translation.en: I love you so much.
But I've missed you.
And I have missed you.
I know why you came here--
translation.fr: Je sais pourquoi tu es ici.

translation.en: Why you took the power of the light-- but this must not happen.
translation.fr:
Tu ne dois pas utiliser
le pouvoir de la Lumière.

translation.en: Why? Why can't we use the power just this once?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi ? Pourquoi ne pas l'utiliser
une seule fois ?

translation.en: -Why can't you stay? -We can't change time.
translation.fr: Tu pourrais rester ? On ne peut modifier le temps.

translation.en: But time was stolen from us...
translation.fr: Ce temps nous a été volé.

translation.en: And it's not fair.
No, it's not fair.
But you have stolen time itself,
translation.fr: Mais tu as volé le temps

translation.en: And you must give it back.
You must destroy the triangle.
Suddenly I feel so alone.
You're never alone. I am with you always, just as I've always been.
translation.fr:
Tu n'es jamais seule. Je suis toujours avec toi.
Je l'ai toujours été.

translation.en: No! [grunts]
-[soldier] Move out! -[groaning]
Lara!
Wait!
Your father begged for his life when we caught him betraying us.
translation.fr:
Ton père voulait que je l'épargne,
après sa trahison. Il me suppliait

translation.en: He pleaded like a baby.
translation.fr:
Ton père voulait que je l'épargne,
après sa trahison. Il me suppliait comme un enfant.

translation.en: Surrender.
Never.
He seemed particularly concerned that I shouldn't... Take this.
translation.fr:
Il semblait contrarié
que je lui prenne ça.

translation.en: Lara, no! The place is coming down! This is insane!
translation.fr:
Lara ! Non ! Tout va s'écrouler !
C'est de la folie !

translation.en: Get them out of here.
You just hurry.
There you go-- safe and sound.
No guns.
Oh, my god!
Quiet.
LORD RICHARD CROFT MISSING IN THE FIELD MAY 15 1985 LOST BUT NEVER FORGOTTEN
What?
